title: 2674 Buena Vista Ave., Walnut Creek, Ca
posting_body: Walnut Creek In-Law unit...Spacious Living Room...Large Master Bedroom with Area for Desk/Computer...2 Bathrooms...
One with a Walk-in Tub...Inside Laundry with Side-by-Side Washer and Dryer...Country Kitchen with Electric Oven/Cooktop, Refrigerator, Dishwasher and a Micro-wave too...
ALL Utilities included as well as Cable TV and WiFi....
Terrific commute location and close to Larkey Park/Pool, Public Tennis courts and Alexander Lindsey Museum...NO SMOKING....
NO PETS....Landlord lives in the Attached home and Prefers one or two people at the most....Make an appointment with the listing agent...
Bill Gallagher, Broker..DRE#00389865...Looking for Excellent Credit and job income history...
Tenant required to secure a policy of Renters insurance prior to occupancy...
Owner looking for a One Year Lease...!!!!!
